alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 4:28PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Geneva, south central Houston, northwestern Jackson and northeastern Holmes Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 428 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Graceville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Graceville, Esto, Madrid, Campbellton, Noma, Black, Miller Crossroads, Fadette, Jacob City, Kellys Crossroads, Garretts Crossroads, Bethlehem, Tendil Crossing, Southern Junction, Sealy Springs, Holland Crossroads, Ards Crossroads, Cobb Crossroads and Jacobs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
